title: S12 Ep191: Children of the Darkness
itunes:title: Children of the Darkness
description:
Darkness invades our show for the first time ever! We discuss the paranormal from the perspective of the Children of the Darkness.

Darkness Dave is joined by daughters Paci & Ripley to discuss the paranormal. They share insights and some funny and frightening encounters and turn the table on their Dad.

Halloween is a time for family and scary tales and the Schrader clan delivers!
